name: Furry Lust
description:
Short arcade game with beautiful furry girls. Relaxing music and cozy yet spicy atmosphere. Awesome for relax after a day at work.
Features:
• One-hand gaming
• Additive Gameplay
• Full HD Artworks
• Relaxing music
• LGBTQ+ friendly
• The best way to spend your night alone (or family if you are brave enough)!
• Great gift for a furry lovers and even haters just to troll them.
• Art by @ZHADART
